job.name: TpcRS
job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setenv NODEBUG yes # starver .DEV2 # setup gcc451 set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set file = `basename $evtsFile .fzd` # set file = $INPUTFILE0; echo "${file}" set logFile = ${file}B.log set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*${file}*.root"` if ("$f" == "") then root4star -q -b 'TpcRS.C(50,"devTA,TpcRS,StiCA","'${evtsFile}'","Bichsel")' >& ${logFile} endif
